```
apiVersion: projectcalico.org/v3
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: restrict-intern-access
  namespace: prod-engineering
spec:
  serviceAccountSelector: 'role == "intern"'
  ingress:
    - action: Allow
      source:
        serviceAccounts:
          selector: 'role == "intern"'
  egress:
    - action: Allow
      destination:
        serviceAccounts:
          selector: 'role == "intern"'
```
